Bitcoin Freedom PAC

Super PAC (Independent Expenditure-Only) - Unauthorized | ID: C00822775 | Registration date: August 15, 2022

The Bitcoin Freedom PAC is a pro-Bitcoin PAC aiming to prevent Democratic victories.
